nightfox.nvim

Summary

Theme kit for Neovim

ðŸ¦ŠA soft dark, fully customizable (Neo)Vim theme, with support for lsp, treesitter and a variety of plugins.

Configuration

Loading with packer.nvim:

use "EdenEast/nightfox.nvim"

Set color scheme Vim-style:

cmd[[colorscheme nightfox]]

Configure with whatever else you got going on
